鵸鵸鵸

鵸字的基本解释

鵸
qí
〔鵸??（
y?）〕古代传说中的一种怪鸟，如：“（翼望之山）有鸟焉，其状如乌，三首六尾而善笑，名曰鵸鵸。”

鵸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qí］
［《廣韻》渠羈切，平支，羣。］
见“鵸”。

鵸字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵸； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1492第24
【廣韻】渠基切【集韻】渠羈切，?音奇。【山海經】翼望之山有鳥，如烏，三首六尾，名鵸䳜。又【集韻】於宜切，音漪。義同。

鵸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鵸字的起名意思

暂无。

Redhead
Basic explanation of words
Redhead
qí
〔鵸?? (
y?)] A kind of strange bird in ancient legends, such as: "(Yiwangzhishan) there is a bird Yan, which looks like a black, with three heads and six tails and a good smile. The name is 鵸鵸."
Redhead
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qí］
["Guang Yun" Qu Zhi cut, flat branch, group. ]
See "鵸".
Redhead
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鵸; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1492 Page 24
[Guangyun] Qu Jiqie [Jiyun] Qu Jiqie, sound odd. [Shanhaijing] The mountains with wings and eyes have birds, such as black crows, with three heads and six tails, and they are named 鵸䳜. [Jiyun] Yu Yiqie, Yinyi. The same meaning.
